summary: A mentally unstable man, who has been kept in isolation for years, escapes and causes trouble for his identical twin brother.
cast: Albert Dekker|Susan Hayward|Harry Carey|Frances Farmer|Gordon Jones|Jean Phillips|Ernest Whitman|Maude Eburne|Frank M. Thomas|Harlan Briggs|Archie Twitchell|Dorothy Sebastian|William Stack|Jane Allen|Rod Cameron|Eddy Chandler|Lane Chandler|Catherine Craig|Jack Curtis|Abe Dinovitch|Mimi Doyle|Jim Farley|Christian J. Frank|Kit Guard|Frank Hagney|Chuck Hamilton|Len Hendry|Ray Hirsch|John Kellogg|Patti Lacey|Ethan Laidlaw|Roy Lester|James Millican|Clarence Muse|Ella Neal|Blanche Payson|Keith Richards|Lee Shumway|Harry Tenbrook|George Turner|Bess Wade|Delmar Watson|Jack Watson|Richard Webb
title: Among the Living
